m_title: Load custom JavaScript code for Z-Wave application
m_descr: The use of this app requires solid knowledge of JavaScript programming. The code provided in this app will be executed when Z-Wave module is loaded. There is no way to create an element but its possible to access the Network data holders. This app is for JavaScript professionals only.
err_load: Failed to load custom user code:
l_choose_zway: Z-Way instance for which execute your code:
l_customCodeOnLoad: Your JavaScript code on Z-Way load:
l_customCodeOnUnload: Your JavaScript code on Z-Way unload (for clear restart of Z-Wave application or on UZB plug/unplug):
